title: Black mask (i)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Black mask (i) is an upgraded version of the Black mask. The Black mask can be imbued into a Black mask (i) through playing the Nightmare Zone or Soul Wars minigame. It costs 1,250,000 points or 500 points, respectively, to imbue. The imbued Black mask can also be used to create an imbued Slayer helmet.

The Black mask (i) is an upgraded version of the Black mask. The Black mask can be imbued into a Black mask (i) through playing the Nightmare Zone or Soul Wars minigame. It costs 1,250,000 points or 500 points, respectively, to imbue. The imbued Black mask can also be used to create an imbued Slayer helmet.

This version of the Black mask provides the original bonus:

  • 16.67%[1] bonus to Melee accuracy and Strength.

Plus the addition of:

  • 15% bonus to Ranged accuracy and Strength.
  • 15% bonus to Magic accuracy and Magic damage.
  • Getting rid of the -3 Magic and -1 Ranged attack penalties from the regular black mask.

If lost on death in PvP situations, the mask will lose its imbued status, and the player will have to obtain the Nightmare Zone points or Zeal Tokens to imbue it again.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
20 February 2014
(update | poll)

The Slayer helmet (i) and all versions of the black mask (i) now offer a 15% damage boost to Magic damage against your assigned Slayer target, like they already do for melee and Ranging.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 18 January 2016. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "7/6."

[[File:Black mask (i) detail.png|left|130px]]
[[File:Black mask (i) chathead.png|left]]
The '''Black mask (i)''' is an upgraded version of the [[Black mask]]. The Black mask can be imbued into a Black mask (i) through playing the [[Nightmare Zone]] or [[Soul Wars]] minigame. It costs 1,250,000 [[Nightmare Zone#Rewards|points]] or 500 points, respectively, to imbue. The imbued Black mask can also be used to create an [[Slayer helmet (i)|imbued Slayer helmet]].

This version of the Black mask provides the original bonus:

*16.67%{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/689105142382198784|date=18 January 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/xzKBj|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=7/6.}} bonus to [[Melee]] accuracy and [[Strength]].

Plus the addition of:
*15% bonus to [[Ranged]] accuracy and Strength.
*15% bonus to [[Magic]] accuracy '''and''' Magic damage.
*Getting rid of the -3 Magic and -1 Ranged attack penalties from the regular black mask.

If lost on death in [[PvP]] situations, the mask will '''lose''' its imbued status, and the player will have to obtain the [[Nightmare Zone points]] or [[Zeal Tokens]] to imbue it again.
